false FC4 Open World: ACE unlocker
Unlocks All skills from the start.
Changes made by this mod: [list] [*] The ACE signature weapon, based on the A52 assault rifle, is available in the shop. [/list]
Other Information: [list] [*] This mod is part of jvarnes' Open World Mod. [*] This mod is co-op friendly. [/list]
